Translations.Text: They challenge ona bring retribution! If je for predetermined appointment retribution pojdem them ihned! Istota it pojdem them zrazu when they menej expect it
They challenge ona bring retribution! Hell already surrounds disbelievers
Dni pojdem when retribution overwhelms them z above them beneath ich nohy; He say Chut consequences tvoj robota
O Moj servants verit Moj zem bol spacious so kult Mna
Everyone chut smrt potom us ona ultimately spatny listok
Those verit lead righteous zivot my iste zaplatit them Raj rezidencia flowing streams Eternally they abide therein. Co dobry reward robotnik
They bol jeden steadfastly persevere trust ich Lord
Vela creature nie beriem its provision GOD zadovazit for it i ona. He bol Hearer Omniscient
Ona ziadat them Kto created heavens zem put sun moon tvoj servis they say GOD robit potom they deviate
GOD bol JEDEN ZVACSIT provision whomever He ZVOLIT SI JEHO creatures withholds it GOD bol fully aware z all things
Ona ziadat them Kto sends sky zavlazit revive dead zem they say GOD Say Chvalit GOD Vela z them nie chapat
